did.unittitle: Cornell Organization for Labor Action (COLA) Leaflet
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Handout protesting lack of diversity in NYSSILR Labor Economics Department.

bioghist.p: COLA is the Cornell Organization for Labor Action.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a leaflet protesting the lack of diversity in NYSSILR Labor Economics Department.

controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
